about_the_game:
Welcome to Brick Masters!

Brick Masters is a brick building game that allows you to build anything you can think of using bricks. Follow the premade worlds and use the instructions to build them brick by brick.

Features

  • Advanced brick building system that allows you to build anything
  • Sandbox mode that lets you build with no restrictions
  • Bombs and boulders to destroy your brick world
  • Physics based system that allows you to collapse brick structures
  • Ragdolls characters that behave "realistic" when you throw them around

Features in development

  • Chains: Build a chain from joints connecting two bricks
  • Share your creations on steamworks
  • Multiple Bombs: Various bomb each with different explosion effect
  • Collisions: When an object with high speed collides with another it creates an explosion
  • Motors: Use motors to make moving parts
  • Environments: Different starting environments
... and more coming!

Come join us on early access!
